mapper.select: SELECT item_code, item_name FROM dict_hospital_lab WHERE fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} AND date_type = #{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND group_id is NOT NULL AND group_name is NOT NULL order by item_name
mapper.update: update dict_hospital_lab set fk_dict_code = null where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select is_top, id,date_type, personal_min_value, personal_max_value from dict_hospital_lab where item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId}
SELECT DISTINCT assay_month FROM patient_assay_record WHERE fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} AND assay_month IS NOT NULL ORDER BY assay_month
select group_name,id,item_code,item_name,group_id from dict_hospital_lab WHERE fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} group by group_name

select
from dict_hospital_lab where flage=1 and fk_tenant_id=#{tenantId} group by group_name ORDER BY group_name

select
from dict_hospital_lab where flage=1 and fk_tenant_id=#{fkTenantId} ORDER BY group_name

SELECT dhl.item_code, dhl.item_name, dhl.group_id, dhl.group_name,IF(agcd.item_code is null, 0, 1) as selectFlag FROM dict_hospital_lab dhl LEFT JOIN assay_group_conf_detail agcd ON dhl.item_code = agcd.item_code AND dhl.fk_tenant_id=#{fkTenantId} AND dhl.fk_tenant_id = agcd.fk_tenant_id AND agcd.fk_assay_group_conf_id = #{fkAssayGroupConfId} ORDER BY selectFlag desc, dhl.group_name, dhl.item_name
